d1_flags: 1. goto C93D19 if CARPAINTER_DEFEATED is set
d1_text:
Npc0308:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG CARPAINTER_DEFEATED L_C93D19]
ï¿½If you go to the east,[PAUSE 15] you could run into trouble.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Peaceful Rest Valley and Happy-Happy Village are waiting for you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I've also heard that there are UFO's in the Peaceful Rest Valley.[HALT][END]
